description: Detects change of user environment. Adversaries can insert code into these files to gain persistence each time a user logs in or opens a new shell. Author: Peter Matkovski. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Edit of .bash_profile and .bashrc
query: (type:"PATH" AND name:("\/root\/.bashrc" OR "\/root\/.bash_profile" OR "\/root\/.profile" OR \/home\/*\/.bashrc OR \/home\/*\/.bash_profile OR \/home\/*\/.profile OR "\/etc\/profile" OR "\/etc\/shells" OR "\/etc\/bashrc" OR "\/etc\/csh.cshrc" OR "\/etc\/csh.login"))
